### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24279](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24279) (build: Make `$(package)_*_env` available to all `$(package)_*_cmds` by hebasto)
* [#22811](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22811) (build: Fix depends build system when working with subtargets by hebasto)
* [#22126](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22126) (build: Disable make builtin rules. by dgoncharov)
* [#19952](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19952) (build, ci: Add file-based logging for individual packages by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
